input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
New Era NBA Women's Midnite Tech 9Twenty Adjustable Cap

Item features:
Polyester 100%
Imported
Women's lightly structured 9Twenty
Sublimated Gray blend pattern
Black with official team color
input_text.Response A: The New Era NBA Women's Midnite Tech 9Twenty Adjustable Cap is made of Polyester and imported. It is a Women's lightly structured 9Twenty with a sublimated Gray blend pattern.
input_text.Response B: The New Era NBA Women's Midnite Tech 9Twenty adjustable cap is a stylish and versatile accessory for women who love basketball. Made of 100% polyester, this cap is durable and comfortable for everyday wear. The black color with official team colors ensures you can represent your favorite basketball team in style. The lightly structured 9Twenty design fits well and looks great on any woman. The black and gray blend pattern is sublimated, making it look understated yet sophisticated. This cap is the perfect accessory for any occasion, whether you're watching the game at home or cheering on your team in person. Show your love for basketball with this stylish cap from New Era.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A was very brief and messy and got to color of the hat wrong.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response B was very informal, on point, and gave an excellent description of the item in question.
